Message: The user completes the submission of the form
I'd like to be approved to run ads longer than 1 minut

Hi Kyle, to run ads longer than 1 minute, you need to ensure your ad complies with our advertising policy. Please check out our policy document for detailed guidelines on ad length and other requirements: [Ad Policy and Standards](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/sections/24753741763085-Ad-Policy-and-Standards). If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!

I'm sorry to hear that, Kyle. To get approval for running ads longer than 1 minute, please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Ad Length Approval Request. Include your company's full address, legal entity name, EHID or DUNS number, primary contact person's name, and phone number. Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, let me know!
